title: All must listen to this masterpiece
body:
Though masterpiece is an understatement, as there is no term in the English language to describe such unfathomable epicness. It is difficult to understand how humans are even CAPABLE of producing such sounds as 3:56 - 4:18...
One finds the need to maximize his volume, for optimum levels of epicness.
http://youtu.be/O6taeBwXyXg?t=3m56s
